original_text: Then Judas Iscariot went to the leaders of the priests. He said that he would help them to catch Jesus. (Judas was one of Jesus' 12 apostles.)
korean_text: 열둘 중의 하나인 가룟 유다가 예수를 넘겨 주려고 대제사장들에게 가매

sentences.original_text: Then Judas Iscariot went to the leaders of the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 가롯 유다는 제사장들의 지도자들에게 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: He said that he would help them to catch Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 예수를 잡는 것을 도와주겠다고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: Judas was one of Jesus' 12 apostles
